text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ————A "King". In short, one such as I.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
This Orfevre should be the one to reign over 
the turf, as a true champion. As such——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
I decree. I shall obtain it without fail. 
The splendor that belongs to me. ————The Triple Crown.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Let it be known. My radiance will eclipse all heroes that came before. 
I will become the "King" that rules over heaven and Earth.

……my breath was taken away. As if she were a true "King", 
I was struck by her demeanor and the pressure she gave off——

——This morning. I was going to attend an event held 
at a museum inside the Tokyo Racecourse. A special 
exhibit featuring legendary Uma Musume and trainers.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ————You there. Stand aside.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Rejoice. You have been blessed by heaven. 
Heed the orders of a King. ——Act as guide.

It was such a sudden situation that I couldn't help but feel confused. 
……And she was looking directly at the ticket in my hand.

Maybe she was telling me 『Guide me to the exhibit』……? 
Faced by her sharp gaze and intense pressure, it was hard to refuse——
——In the end, I ended up guiding her to the museum exhibit hall.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Umu. Good work.

As soon as Orfevre entered the museum, she showed no interest in 
any exhibits along the way, proceeding further and further……!
choice_data_list: You're not even going to look?
You're not even going to look?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
My interest is only in my irreverent forerunners. 
I have no use for the others.

……Orfevre only stopped in front of the main exhibit. 
Here, legendary Uma Musume and their trainers were lined up.

Some of them had dramatic victories, others with 
historic feats…… Seeing everyone that left their 
mark in the racing world, made my heart dance.

That was my dream. Just like them, I want to raise an 
amazing Uma Musume and eventually obtain that glory——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
————The sight of a true "King", I will 
be the one to burn that in to your eyes.

I looked towards her at those sharp words. 
……Her eyes were fixed on the Triple Crown Uma Musume.
choice_data_list: What do you mean by true "King"……?
What do you mean by true "King"……?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Many things.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
You, are you saying that you only came here out of admiration? 
……If so, then it seems you do not even know yourself.

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text:
——Excuse me! Ah, sorry for approaching so suddenly! 
I'm doing interviews for television and wanted to hear 
the impressions of everyone who came to visit……!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text:
You were looking at the Triple Crown Uma Musume exhibit just now, 
right? As a fellow Uma Musume, is there someone you admire?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: No.

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text:
Ehh—— 
……I-I see.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
……Everyone here is someone extraordinary who 
has shown their strength to the world. Their 
running would certainly go down in history.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
However, that is all glory from an era with no "King". The world 
still does not know. The true eminence of a run by a "King".

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Therefore, I will show them. What it means to be "King". Under my 
reign, I will step past all of these heroes, and show the world.

The bystanders begin to stir at Orfevre's words. 
Before long, an audience had gathered around her……!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ————A "King". In short, one such as I.

In her words, there was none of it. No hesitation, 
uncertainty, nor doubt. There was only one thing——

An overwhelming self-confidence and conviction that she is a "King". 
I couldn't take my eyes off of her strong presence……!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text:
——T-then, are you saying that…… 
You'll become a Triple Crown Uma Musume……!?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Of course. The entire reason I have made my way 
here was to see these irreverent forerunners.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Forget your dreams, and pray 
————Before the undeniable "King", and their reign.

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text:
Ahh! Um, if you'd like, let's talk……! 
………Aaah, she left——

text_block_list.name: Visitor A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, hey……! Just who is that Uma Musume……? Wasn't her 
intensity crazy……!? Just seeing her made me quiver……!

text_block_list.name: Visitor B
text_block_list.text:
Normally, saying something like that here would be unthinkable but…… 
For some reason, I'm kind of curious……——

As Orfevre's words echoed through my mind, I couldn't 
help but feel a sense of excitement and chased after her.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
……Our business has already finished. 
What are your intentions?

The only thing that came to mind was that I had a 
strong interest in Orfevre. However, I wasn't 
sure how to put it into words or what to do.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
——Welcome back, Or. 
How was the exhibit?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Aneue—— 
……to confirm it, it was enough.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
That's splendid. 
……Who is this?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: My guide.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I see. You must have had your own plans too. To think you'd 
postpone that to guide my little sister. Thank you very much.

I was surprised when this Uma Musume appeared and 
called Orfevre her 『little sister』. She had already 
been making a name for herself in the racing world.
——Her name was Dream Journey.

The 『Takarazuka Kinen』 and 『Arima Kinen』. 
She had won both grand prix races in the same 
year. She was considered a top tier Uma Musume.

That Dream Journey's younger sister was Orfevre. ……There was 
no doubt that both of these sisters were extraordinary Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
I'm returning home. 
Aneue, prepare the tea and snacks.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I will. ……Good work. Just leave the rest to me, 
the older sister. Well then, please excuse us——

……In the end, all I could do was stand there 
and watch Orfevre leave without saying a word.

Even now my heart was buzzing. 
The shock of standing before that presence.

……Somedays later. I still couldn't get Orfevre 
out of my mind. I decided to watch a Selection 
Race for Uma Musume who hadn't debuted——
……The moment I saw that figure, I could feel my blood surging.
